subject: College Athletics
Lacrosse
lead_paragraph: The Syracuse seniors Kenny Nims and Pat Perritt scored four goals each Saturday as the defending champion Orange routed Duke, 17-7, in the N.C.A.A. Division I men’s semifinals.
snippet: The Syracuse seniors Kenny Nims and Pat Perritt scored four goals each Saturday as the defending champion Orange routed Duke, 17-7, in the N.C.A.A. Division I men’s semifinals.
